relnotes.name: ETel Server and Core
relnotes.purpose: ETel Telephony Server and core APIs. The server controls and shares multi-client access to the phone hardware, running as a thread within the Comms process, and defines a framework for plugin TSY extensions which implement device-dependent behaviour and interface to the licensee supplied telephony signalling stack.

defect.title: ETel Multiple Request Completion code could cause ETel to panic
When going online with Maps and data connection is established, phone will reset
OpenSubSessionObjectByNameL should assert that received object is not NULL

relnotes.defect: Added assertions after calls to OpenNewObjectL and OpenNewObjectByNameL.
Added method to reset the session handle.

relnotes.cr: No FDN check if request has proactive origin

relnotes.defect: ETel is now less susecptable to panicking in OOM situations

relnotes.defect: HSDPA and EGPRS Cell Indicators support has been added

defect.title: TTlvStructBase::NextItemL does not behave as expected with 0 length item

relnotes.defect: TTlvStructBase::NextItemL and TTlvStructBase::RemoveNextItemL have been modified to support zero-length items

defect.title: ETel client side crashes when S60 OMA PoC client is started without SIM card

relnotes.defect: Fixed CAsyncRetrieveVariableLengthBufferV2 so that it does not Panic on cancellation. Panic was occurring due to a request completion of a TRequestStatus pointer

defect.title: The Etel CMI file must be modified to enable the BServer to run in the C32 pr...

relnotes.defect: ETel's configuration cmi file is now split into a separate component, telephony_etel-config, which should allow for simpler licensee customisation
relnotes.minorchange: ETel's PlatSec policy table reduced to approx. 10% its original size; all duplicate entries are now removed
